Label.text: By checking the box below, we understand that you consent to participate in this research. By leaving a box unchecked, we understand that you do not consent to that part of the study. To proceed with the experiment, all boxes must be checked. If you have questions before agreeing to any of these points, please email _________@ucl.ac.uk.

I confirm that I have read and understood the Information regarding the study on the previous page. I have had an opportunity to consider the information and what will be expected of me. I have also been provided with a way to ask questions about the study and would like to take part in the experiment.
I understand that I will be able to withdraw my data by writing to __________@ucl.ac.uk

I consent to the processing of the personal information I give in the questionnaire for the purposes explained on the previous page. I understand that such information will be handled in accordance with all applicable data protection legislation.

I understand that all personal information will remain confidential and efforts will be made to ensure I can't be identified. Personal data gathered through this app will be stored anonymously and securely using codes (e.g. A001). It won't be possible to identify me in any publications or reports.
I understand that my information may be subject to review by responsible individuals from the University (to include sponsors and funders) for monitoring and audit purposes.
I understand that the data will not be made available to any commercial organisations but is solely the responsibility of the researcher(s) undertaking this study.
I agree that my anonymised research data may be used by others for future research. No one will be able to identify me when this data is shared.
I hereby confirm that I understand the exclusion criteria as detailed on the previous page and that I do fall under them.
I am aware of who I should contact if I wish to lodge a complaint.
I understand that my personal data will be processed and kept so long as it is required for the research project, and be eventually destroyed.
I would be happy for my data that have been rendered unidentifiable be archived at http://reshare.ukdataservice.ac.uk/.
I voluntarily agree to take part in this research.
To continue, all boxes must be agreed to.
